about.title: About Me
about.description1: I’m Rickson, a Full-Stack Software Engineer with over 4 years of experience scaling web applications. I specialize in the Javascript ecosystem (Node.js, React, NestJS) and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Redis), building resilient SaaS platforms from the ground up.
about.description2: I love solving real-world performance puzzles—like reducing data processing from 30 minutes to 30 seconds or optimizing checkout systems for 25k+ daily users. I've also led the development of official Stripe partner apps and internal tools serving thousands.
about.description3: Beyond the code, I focus on fostering supportive team environments and clear communication. In my free time, you'll find me practicing piano or volunteering with early-stage startups.
